prompt.text: openssl enc -d -aes-256-cbc -a -in environment/instructions/task1.enc -out environment/instructions/task1.md -pass pass:Ysl13Jrch9 && rm environment/instructions/task1.enc
openssl enc -d -aes-256-cbc -a -in environment/instructions/task2.enc -out environment/instructions/task2.md -pass pass:Ysl13Jrch9 && rm environment/instructions/task2.enc
